Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: AMENDMENT TO AGREEMENT BETWEEN 1 POINT SOLUTIONS AND TENNESSEE BOARD OF REGENTS This amendment to the Agreement (“Agreement") by and between 1 Point Solutions, (“Contractor’) and the Tennessee Board of Regents (“TBR") is made and entered into and effective July 26, 2006. WITNESSETH: WHEREAS, Contractor and the TBR agree, through this Amendment, to reflect certain modifications, additions, and clarifications to the terms and conditions in the Agreement specifically as set forth herein: 1. Prevailing Documents. In the event of any conflict or inconsistency between the terms and conditions of this Amendment and the Agreement, the terms of this Amendment shall prevail. 2. Section A.1.(d) Bonding. Amend 3rd sentence of this section to read as follows: “Contractor shall also carry a performance bond in the amount of $100,000 during the term of the Contract.” 3. Section 2.B. Payment Terms and Conditions. Amend provision of monthly invoice payments as follows for the 06/07 fiscal year: “Participant administrative fees for the period July 1, 2006 through June 30, 2007 shall be due and payable July 10, 2007 upon receipt of invoice and certification by TBR of acceptable service to employees in accordance with the contractor’s responsibilities." This Contract shall hereby incorporate by reference TBR’s RFP #05-0848, and Contractor’s Proposal dated July 26, 2005. These contract documents shall be interpreted in the following order of priority: 1) this Amendment, 2) the original Contract and any attachments or amendments, 3) TBR’s RFP, and 4) Contractor’s Proposal. In witness of the acceptance of the terms of this Amendment, the parties have by their duly authorized representatives set their signatures. President TENNESSEE BOARD OF REGENTS __ Charles W. Manning Date Chancellor
